title: Charlotte Tells Rioters Anyone Caught Looting Will Lose Welfare and Food Stamps Permanently
subtitle: A fake news site played to racially charged rhetoric by claiming that Keith Lamont Scott protest 'rioters' in Charlotte would lose all government benefits if caught looting.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Charlotte "rioters" will lose all government benefits if caught "looting" during protests after the death of Keith Lamont Scott.
